s: Introducing Luna, Amazon’s cloud gaming service where it’s easy to play great games on devices you already own. No waiting for lengthy downloads—just play.
You can play Luna on your Windows PC, MAC, Fire TV, Fire Tablet, iPad, iPhone, Chromebooks, select Android phones, supported Samsung Smart TVs and LG Smart TVs.
Introducing Luna, Amazon’s cloud gaming service where it’s easy to play great games on devices you already own. No waiting for lengthy downloads—just play.

1 week ago - Amazon Luna is a cloud gaming platform developed and operated by Amazon. The platform has integration with Twitch and is available on Windows, Mac, Amazon Fire TV, iOS (as a progressive web app) as well as Android. Games and channels from brands such as Ubisoft+ and Jackbox Games are accessed ...

s: Amazon Luna is a cloud gaming service that lets you play games from the cloud using devices you already own.

s: January 4, 2025 - Explore Amazon Luna, a next-gen cloud gaming experience on your existing devices—no costly hardware needed. Experience seamless play with Luna cloud gaming.

t: Amazon Official Site: Amazon Luna Controller
s: The Luna Controller was designed for cloud gaming. Its Cloud Direct technology connects directly to Amazon’s custom game servers for lower latency gaming.

t: Subscribe to Luna+ | Amazon Luna Cloud Gaming
s: Amazon Luna Cloud Gaming: Luna+ gives you access to a library of games across genres. Play 100+ games on devices you already own. $9.99/month, cancel anytime

t: Luna Supported Countries - Amazon Customer Service
s: Customers from these countries are eligible to stream games via Luna, within these locales, without impacting their streaming quality, subject to additional restrictions.

t: What Are Amazon Luna Subscriptions? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Luna subscriptions let you choose from a catalog of games to play on Luna.

s: Want to play Fortnite on the go? Learn how to play Fortnite on various mobile devices from Smartphones to tablets we have you covered.

t: Set Up Amazon Luna - Amazon Customer Service
s: To play games on Luna, install the Luna app on a compatible device or use a supported web browser.
